verbose_text: XREF_BIBR) 3.2 Regulation of SV docking close to Ca 2+ channels -- Phosphorylation of an AZ protein --.. Residual Ca 2+ after AP firing accumulates and activates protein kinases that modulate the property of SNARE proteins XREF_BIBR) and Ca 2+ sensors, XREF_BIBR) resulting in the modulation of transmitter release probability.
